revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WRP400 |revision= |upc=745883580958 |asin=B000YQLCGG |manuf_country= |manuf=CyberTAN |manuf_model=WGV414 |manuf_rev= |availability= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/05/2007 |fcc_id=Q87-WRP400 |ic_id=3839A-WRP400 |pcb_id=3763-14141406R |type=wireless router, analog phone gateway |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88W8518 |cpu1_cspeed=360 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S29GL064A90TFIR3 |ram1=32 |ram1_brand=Mira |ram1_model=P2V28S40CTP-G6 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip1_model=88W8518 |wi1_chip2_brand=Marvell |wi1_chip2_model=88W8010 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6061 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |flags=VoIP, 2x FXS ports, |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.15.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Wireless-G Broadband Router with 2 Phone Ports}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WRP400}} :{{•}} [https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/obsolete/unified-communications/cisco-wrp400-wireless-g-broadband-router-with-2-phone-ports.html Support page] (Cisco)
Per the FCC docs... *Initial Filing (07/05/2007) :"3763-14141406R" is silkscreened on the board. :There is no USB port pictured on the board.. but there are solder pads for one. *C2PC made 01/23/2009 :"3763-14141403R" is silkscreened on the board. :The change notice notes that the USB port was added through a class I change. :The change noted additional USB 3.5G (CDMA) sticks will be tested with the device. :*''Sprint'' - ''Novatel Wireless'' Ovation U727 - FCC ID: PKRNVWMC727 :*''Sprint'' - ''Novatel Wireless'' Ovation U720 - FCC ID: PKRNVWMCD3000 :*''[[Sierra Wireless]]'' AirCard 595U - FCC ID: N7N-MC5725U *C2PC made 07/14/2009 :"3763-14141406R" is silkscreened on the board. :The WLAN PA was changed from a ''Fairchild'' RMPA2455 to a ''[[Richwave]]'' RTC6691E.
===Links=== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/OpenWrtDocs/Hardware/Linksys/WRP400 ''Linksys WRP400'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :The CPU is stated as a 88W8518 in the boot log. This is presumed to be correct. *[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=15588 ''Linksys locking down serial bootloader console'' on the '''OpenWrt''' forums] *[http://www.nslu2-linux.org/wiki/WRP400/HomePage WRP400 on the NSLU2-Linux wiki] ([http://www.nslu2-linux.org/wiki/WRP400/PhotosOfTheInternals Internal photos])
===See also=== *[[Linksys WRP400-G2]] (G3) • [http://neotrix.pl/pliki/pdf/Cisco%20WRP400-G2%20802.11G.pdf Spec.] • [https://yadi.sk/a/TrhFT9Tf3VEH8r PCB images] :CPU/WLAN: [[Marvell]] 88W8638/88W8010; SW: 88E6061 :"3763-14141404R" is silkscreened on the board.
